headline: Is Waters (WAT) Still Fairly Priced After Mixed Share Returns And Rich P/E Multiple
summary: Wondering whether Waters at around US$387 a share still offers solid value, or if the easy gains are behind it? This article walks through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. The share price has seen mixed returns, with a 2.4% decline over the last 7 days, a 2.5% gain over 30 days, 1.4% year to date, a 4.1% decline over 1 year, 14.4% over 3 years and 41.6% over 5 years, which raises questions about how the current price lines up with underlying business performance. Recent...
